fr.upem.android.deadhal.maze

Class Direction

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upem.android.deadhal.maze.Direction
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Input, Output

    public abstract class Direction
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing the different inputs or outputs in a room
    Author:
    Alexandre ANDRE, Dylan BANCE, Remy BARBOSA, Houmam WEHBEH

        public static int getDirectionToInt(java.lang.String direction)
